en: <V>{player} <R>rolled a double 3 times and went to jail.
tr: <V>{player} <R>üç defa çift zar attığı için hapise düştü.

en: <V>{player} <R>was sent to jail! Do not pass "GO" or collect $200.
<ROSE>Roll the dice to determine start order.
<V>{player} <J>has to pay $200 in income tax from collecting too much cheese!
tr: <V>{player} <J>çok fazla peynir topladığı için $200 gelir vergisi ödemek zorunda kaldı.

en: <V>{player} <J>has to pay $100 in luxury tax for being too noob!
tr: <V>{player} <J>fazla noob olduğu için $100 özel tüketim vergisi ödemek zorunda kaldı.

en: <V>{player} <R>went bankrupt and has lost the game! All of their assets will be turned over to <V>{playerowner}.
tr: <V>{player} <R>iflas etti ve oyunu kaybetti! Tüm malvarlığı <V>{playerowner} <R> oyuncusuna devredilecek.

en: <V>{player} <J>landed on <V>{playerowner}<J>. Property is mortgaged, no rent was collected.
<J>Before you can buy a house, you must own all the properties of this color-group.
